app.title: Your Streaming History Visualized
app.subtitle: Everything stays in your browser, no data is sent to a server.

fileUpload.hint: Select a ZIP archive ( my_spotify_data.zip ) or JSON file(s) ( Streaming_History_Audio_YYYY.json ).
fileUpload.tutorialTitle: How to Get Your Spotify Data
fileUpload.tutorialStep3: Wait for Spotify to email you (can take up to 30 days, but it's usually much faster)
fileUpload.tutorialStep4: Download the ZIP file from the email
fileUpload.errorNoData: No valid data found. Uploaded files must be JSON files starting with "Streaming_History_Audio_" or ZIP archives containing them. Ignored {{count}} file(s)/entry(s).
fileUpload.errorProcessing: Error processing files. Please try again.

dateRangeFilter.title: Date Range Filter
dateRangeFilter.subtitle: Drag the handles to filter by month and year

footer.privacy: There is no data saved to your device or sent to a server.
